description: Changed the variable name 'output' to 'result' to test the impact of variable renaming.
Changed the condition to check if 'repos' is an array before proceeding to iterate over it.
Added a fallback for when 'repo.description' is undefined to prevent potential runtime errors.
udiff:
--- +++ @@ -40,7 +40,7 @@
${repo.name} -

${repo.description}

+

${repo.description || 'No description available'}

// Added fallback for undefined description
Starts: ${repo.stargazers_count}

description: Changed the timeout duration to 1000 milliseconds to test the effect of a shorter alert display time.
Added a check to ensure the message is not empty before creating the alert.

description: Changed the class name of the alert div to 'alert-warning' to test different alert styles.
Changed the condition to check if currentAlert is not null or undefined.
Added a return statement to indicate the function's completion.
Introduced a try-catch block to handle potential errors during removal.
Changed the innerHTML assignment to null instead of an empty string.
Added a console log to indicate that the profile is being cleared.
Introduced a condition to check if profile exists before clearing.
